synopsis.text: Life on Earth has drastically shifted following an alien invasion, forcing the remnants of humanity to seek refuge in underwater colonies known as 'Aqua Bases.' A century after the invasion, hope emerges in the form of a specialized team of five cybernetically enhanced women. Known as Voogie's Angels, these warriors represent humanity's last stand against the extraterrestrial occupiers. As Earth's guardian angels, they embark on a mission to reclaim the planet and secure a brighter future for the human race. This anime follows their valiant efforts and the promise of salvation they bring.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
